Submodules¶

mcscript.compile module¶

mcscript.compile.compileMcScript(text: str, callback: Callable[[str, float, Any], Any], config: mcscript.data.Config.Config) → mcscript.utils.Datapack.Datapack¶

compiles a mcscript string and returns the generated datapack.

Parameters

  • text – the script

  • callback – a callback function that accepts the current state, the progress and the temporary object

  • config – the config

Returns

A datapack

mcscript.mcscript_cli module¶

mcscript.mcscript_cli.main()¶

A command line interface for mcscript. Work in progress.

Command line Parameters:

The first argument must be the mcscript input file.

-m

Sets the worlds directory for minecraft. Default %AppData%/.minecraft/saves

-w

Sets the output world by world name mutually exclusive to -d

-d

Sets the output directory.

-n

Sets the name for the datapack, default McScript

-c

Sets the path to the config file, optional

-v

Sets the verbose flag to true

mcscript.mcscript_cli.on_compile_status(_, msg, progress, interim_result)¶
mcscript.mcscript_cli.testDocstrings(a: int, b)¶
